author: Allison
title: Oven Roasted Spatchcock Chicken Story
text:
Oven Roasted Spatchcock Chicken
Get Recipe!
Off-white Section Separator
If you love tender, juicy chicken my spatchcock chicken recipe is just what you're looking for.
Get Recipe
Off-white Section Separator
WHAT INGREDIENTS DO I NEED TO MAKE Oven Roasted Spatchcock Chicken?
Get Recipe
Off-white Section Separator
– Whole roaster chicken
– Marjoram
– Rosemary
– Thyme
– Ground sage
– Garlic powder
– Black pepper
– Ground nutmeg
– Sweet paprika
– Salted butter
Get Recipe
Off-white Section Separator
Add the marjoram, rosemary, sage, thyme, black pepper, nutmeg, and sweet paprika to a small bowl.
Instructions
Get Recipe!
Off-white Section Separator
Whisk the seasonings to combine. This is our poultry seasoning dry rub.
Get Recipe
Off-white Section Separator
Remove chicken giblets and neck from the cavity of the chicken. Place the whole chicken breast side down on a cutting board.
Get Recipe
Off-white Section Separator
Find the backbone of the chicken from the cavity side, then carefully slice down the backbone on one side.
Get Recipe
Swipe up now to get this recipe!
